column2: an A.M. Eatery////I was really disappointed in this dish. I'm such a huge fan of any kind of egg benedict that this was just downright disrespectful. First of all
column3: the hash brown was so dry and some parts were even burnt. The eggs were poached nicely and runny and I liked the fresh salmon. That was all I liked about this dish. The hollandaise sauce didn't mix well with the salmon and made it taste almost sour. It was just a dry dish overall. No thanks~
